ACIP Meeting on COVID Vaccine Recommendations

Public comments regarding the ACIP meeting focused on recommendations for COVID vaccine access and guidelines.

ðŸ†• New Stances

Additional stances discovered during analysis that didn't fit predefined categories

Stance Count %
Call for rigorous vaccine testing: Demand for gold standard, double-blind inert placebo studies before licensing 1 0.1%
Vaccine Administration Frequency: Support for more frequent vaccination schedules 1 0.1%
Accountability of Pharmaceutical Companies: Support for removing liability protections for pharma companies 1 0.1%
Vaccination Research Process: Demand for rigorous research prior to vaccine licensing 1 0.1%
Vaccine Research Standards: Advocate for rigorous clinical trials for all vaccines 1 0.1%
Health Equity: Advocate for access to vaccines for at-risk individuals 1 0.1%
Moral & Ethical Perspective on Vaccination: Vaccines are contrary to God's will and cause spiritual harm 1 0.1%
Transparency and Accountability in Committee Processes: Demand for disclosure of financial conflicts and expertise 1 0.1%
Prosecution of health officials and vaccine developers for alleged corruption 1 0.1%
Advocacy for Rigorous Testing: Advocacy for extensive independent testing before vaccine recommendations 1 0.1%
Economic Impact of Vaccine Removal: Concern about economic consequences: removing vaccines will hurt tourism and consumer spending; loss of vaccines will lead to greater unemployment 1 0.1%
Political Action: Support for impeachment of public officials 1 0.1%
Public Health: Call for removal of pharmaceutical influence on health decisions 1 0.1%
Support for maintaining vital public health resources 1 0.1%
Research Methodology: Support for rigorous testing methods for vaccines 1 0.1%
Research Integrity: Urgency for rigorous pre-licensing vaccine studies 1 0.1%
Demand for rigorous vaccine testing prior to approval 1 0.1%

CDC-2025-0024-3488 2025-06-18 Karen Sherman
Removal of COVID-19 Vaccines: Support for removal of COVID-19 vaccines Vaccine Safety: Oppose safety of COVID-19 vaccines Public Trust in Health Authorities: Oppose current health authority approach
 None ACIP â€“ Want to Regain the Publicâ€™s Trust? I urge ACIP members to take a firm stance for public health and remove all currently licensed COVID shots from the market. In 1976, the swine flu vaccine was immediately pulled after approximately 25 people died following vaccination. As of May 30, 2025, the... 1 1:1 I urge ACIP members to take a firm stance for public health and remove all currently licensed COVID shots from the market. The comment clearly expresses support for the removal of COVID-19 vaccines and expresses distrust in the current health authorities, as indicated by the call to pull vaccines from the market and the criticism of ACIP's recommendations despite reported deaths. Additionally, the reference to the need for rigorous studies indicates opposition to the perceived lack of safety associated with COVID vaccines.
CDC-2025-0024-7137 2025-06-20 Dwayne King
Removal of COVID-19 Vaccines: Support for removal of COVID-19 vaccines Vaccine Safety: Oppose safety of COVID-19 vaccines Public Trust in Health Authorities: Oppose current health authority approach Role of Science vs. Political Influence: Oppose current science-based policy (alleging bias or corruption)

In 1976, the swine flu vaccine was immediately pulled after approximately 25 people died following vaccination.
